column4: My friend is done with windows, and currently has 7.10 on his machine, but will upgrade to 8.04 when it's out - he wants a good place for a guide to learn more about linux. Anyone know of such a place?
I've heard the book "How Linux Works - What Every Super-User should Know" is pretty good for new users
are you looking for Linux in general or Ubuntu specifically?
either I guess, he didn't specific
